info.title: OpenHouse Tables APIs
info.description: API description for OpenHouse Tables API

get.description: Returns a list of Table resources present in a database identified by databaseId.

post.description: Creates and returns a Table resource in a database identified by databaseId

get.description: Returns a Table resource identified by tableId in the database identified by databaseId.

put.description: Updates or creates a Table and returns the Table resources. If the table does not exist, it will be created. If the table exists, it will be updated.

post.description: Returns a list of Table resources present in a database. Only filter supported is 'database_id'.

get.description: Returns principal to role mappings on Table resource identified by databaseId and tableId.

patch.description: Updates role for principal on Table identified by databaseId and tableId

get.summary: Get AclPolicies for user principal on a table
get.description: Returns role mappings, access information for a principal on resource identified by databaseId and tableId.
Returns a list of Database resources.
Returns principal to role mappings on resource identified by databaseId.

patch.description: Updates role for principal on database identified by databaseId

get.description: Returns a list of Table resources present in a database identified by databaseId.

post.description: Creates and returns a Table resource in a database identified by databaseId

get.description: Returns a Table resource identified by tableId in the database identified by databaseId.

put.description: Updates or creates a Table and returns the Table resources. If the table does not exist, it will be created. If the table exists, it will be updated.

post.description: Returns a list of Table resources present in a database. Only filter supported is 'database_id'.

get.description: Returns principal to role mappings on Table resource identified by databaseId and tableId.

patch.description: Updates role for principal on Table identified by databaseId and tableId

get.summary: Get AclPolicies for user principal on a table
get.description: Returns role mappings, access information for a principal on resource identified by databaseId and tableId.
Returns principal to role mappings on resource identified by databaseId.

patch.description: Updates role for principal on database identified by databaseId

get.description: Returns a list of Database resources.
Returns principal to role mappings on resource identified by databaseId.

columnName.description: Name of the clustering column in provided schema. The column should be of the type 'String'.Nested columns can also be provided with a dot-separated name (for example: 'eventHeader.countryCode').Column name is case-sensitive.

tableId.description: Unique Resource identifier for a table within a Database

databaseId.description: Unique Resource identifier for the Database containing the Table

clusterId.description: Unique Resource identifier for the Cluster containing the Database

schema.description: Schema of the table. OpenHouse tables use Iceberg schema specification

stageCreate.description: Boolean that determines creating a staged table

baseTableVersion.description: The version of table that the current update is based upon

CreateUpdateTableRequestBody.description: Request containing details of the Table to be created

baseTableVersion.example: Base table version to apply the change to

jsonSnapshots.description: List of json serialized snapshots to put

items.description: List of json serialized snapshots to put

additionalProperties.description: Map of branch name to json serialized SnapshotRef. Key is the branch name, and value is the SnapshotRef.

snapshotRefs.description: Map of branch name to json serialized SnapshotRef. Key is the branch name, and value is the SnapshotRef.

IcebergSnapshotsRequestBody.description: Request containing a list of JSON serialized Iceberg Snapshots to be put

sharingEnabled.description: Whether data sharing needs to enabled for the table in /tables API request. Sharing is disabled by default

columnTags.description: Policy tags applied to columns in /tables API request.

PolicyTag.description: Policy tags applied to columns in /tables API request.

count.description: time period in count <granularity> for which the retention on table will be applied

granularity.description: time period granularity for which the retention on table will be applied

Retention.description: Retention as required in /tables API request. The column holds the retention part or Policies.

pattern.description: Pattern for the value of the retention column following java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter standard. Defaults to 'yyyy-MM-dd' day format if empty.

RetentionColumnPattern.description: Optional object to specify retention column in case where timestamp is represented as a string

columnName.description: Name of the timestamp column in provided schema. The column should be of the type 'Timestamp'. Nested columns can also be provided with a dot-separated name (for example: 'eventHeader.timeColumn').Column name is case-sensitive.

transformParams.description: Parameters of the transform. This field can be null

items.description: Parameters of the transform. This field can be null

Transform.description: Transform of the clustering column. This field is optional.

tableId.description: Unique Resource identifier for a table within a Database

databaseId.description: Unique Resource identifier for the Database containing the Table

clusterId.description: Unique Resource identifier for the Cluster containing the Database

tableUri.description: Fully Qualified Resource URI for the table

tableLocation.description: Location of Table in File System / Blob Store

tableCreator.description: Authenticated user principal that created the Table.

schema.description: Schema of the Table in Iceberg

lastModifiedTime.description: Last modification epoch time in UTC measured in milliseconds of a table.

creationTime.description: Table creation epoch time measured in UTC in milliseconds of a table.

results.description: List of Table objects in a database

principal.description: Grantee principal whose role is being updated

operation.description: Whether this is a grant/revoke request

expirationEpochTimeSeconds.description: Optional epoch time in seconds for the role to expire

additionalProperties.description: Optional properties to accept key-value pair

properties.description: Optional properties to accept key-value pair

UpdateAclPoliciesRequestBody.description: Request containing aclPolicies of the Database to be updated

principal.description: Principal with the role on the table/database

expirationEpochTimeSeconds.description: Optional epoch time in seconds for the role to expire

additionalProperties.description: Optional properties to accept key-value pair

properties.description: Optional properties to accept key-value pair

AclPolicy.description: List of acl policies associated with table/database

results.description: List of acl policies associated with table/database

databaseId.description: Unique Resource identifier for the Database

clusterId.description: Unique Resource identifier for the Cluster containing the Database
